snippet: The president should heed a new report and take on an overclassification mania that gravely hinders an informed democracy.
abstract: Editorial cites report from Public Interest Declassification Board finding that system for classifying and declassifying secrets has become so dysfunctional that democracy is suffering from lack of timely information about government; holds Pres Obama should heed report's warning that excess of government secrecy leads to greater amount of leaks.
lead_paragraph: The president should heed a new report and take on an overclassification mania that gravely hinders an informed democracy.
